---Rippersnapper---

Rippersnapper is getting bored, or more correctly is already bored. 
Cutthroat and Blot slam past him, and he twirls following them, 
"Rippersnapper mad enough, mad enough... Rippersnapper will 
show you!" Rippersnapper transforms and lauches two missiles at 
the mess that is Cutthroat and Blot, then he leaps after them.
